data.title: Fabric | Hire Better and Faster with AI
data.description: Fabric is an AI recruitment platform that screen candidates at scale with AI interviews.
data.content:
Fabric | Hire Better and Faster with AI
===============
  

[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/6500a8c6283ad6f18bfe8ca3_fabric_logo_light.svg)](https://www.fabrichq.ai/)

[Home](https://www.fabrichq.ai/)[Blog](https://blog.fabrichq.ai/)

[Book a demo](https://calendar.app.google/ULh34MmMRqcY9f25A)

**AI Interviews that help you hire in 10 days**
===============================================

Fabric takes in depth technical interviews at scale, ensuring you hire better and faster.

[Try now](https://www.fabrichq.ai/demo)[Book a demo](https://calendar.app.google/ULh34MmMRqcY9f25A)

No login or credit card required!

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675ad6e33b23e005094ab2f6_TRANSLATE%20TO%20(3).png)

Hiring shouldn't be this hard
-----------------------------

Is your hiring process stading in your way to build a world class team?

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/6759941d0e68e39facb78e59_Fabric%20HR%20Website%20Icons-01.png)

### 40 days time to  
hire

Hiring talent takes so long that teams decide to settle in the end.

![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/6759941d9cf761fd6782eb33_Fabric%20HR%20Website%20Icons-02.png)

### Recruiters aren't subject experts

Recruiters are unable to screen profiles as they are not from the field.

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/6759941d85895bc9701abfd8_Fabric%20HR%20Website%20Icons-03.png)

### Most L1 interviews waste your time

Your tech panel’s time is wasted on candidates who are not a good fit.

![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/6759941dbf1cd2a9d3740234_Fabric%20HR%20Website%20Icons-04.png)

### Agencies share bad profiles, slowly

You are working with 8-10 agencies, and still can’t hire quickly.

Quality candidates, quicker
---------------------------

With Fabric get ready-for-round-two profiles within 24 hours

### In-depth AI interviews

Shortlisted candidates go through human like AI tech interviews

![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675ad2cdb9bb861b9a2e1e95_Packed%20with%20real%20fruit%2C%20every%20sip%20gives%20you%20a%20taste%20of%20nature%E2%80%99s%20goodness%20(9).jpg)

![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675979927b46eca208dcc7aa_Packed%20with%20real%20fruit%2C%20every%20sip%20gives%20you%20a%20taste%20of%20nature%E2%80%99s%20goodness%20(2).jpg)

### Save engineering team's time

The tech panel only meets candidates who are a technical fit, saving 30+ hours per job post

### Keyword stuffing proof resume shortlisting

Fabric evaluates real skills—not just keywords—so you meet the right candidates.

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675a9eff9b8a25ffa70fb408_Packed%20with%20real%20fruit%2C%20every%20sip%20gives%20you%20a%20taste%20of%20nature%E2%80%99s%20goodness%20(5).jpg)

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675ad2cd9a34353550a02350_Packed%20with%20real%20fruit%2C%20every%20sip%20gives%20you%20a%20taste%20of%20nature%E2%80%99s%20goodness%20(10).jpg)

### Screen existing profiles

Bulk upload existing profiles in Fabric for screening, process hundred of candidates in a day.

### Anti-cheating measures

Fabric has inbuilt robust systems to monitor and flag suspicious activity

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675ad2cdf1e0fd3042292700_Packed%20with%20real%20fruit%2C%20every%20sip%20gives%20you%20a%20taste%20of%20nature%E2%80%99s%20goodness%20(11).jpg)

10x better than agencies,  
at 10% of the cost
----------------------------------------------

**Recruiting agency**

![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675aae2f39aafa7437718334_cross-09.png)

Screens candidates based on keywords, missing true talent

![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675aae2f39aafa7437718334_cross-09.png)

Shares 5 average profiles in a week

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675aae2f39aafa7437718334_cross-09.png)

Gives you superficially vetted profiles, wasting valuable time of your panel

![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675aae2f39aafa7437718334_cross-09.png)

It takes weeks to close a single position

**Fabric**

Screens for quality of projects and experience in resume and AI Interview  

Fabric gives you 20+ profiles within 48 hours

Because of our tech screening, Fabric’s candidates are super relevant

Time to hire with Fabric is less than 10 days

Loved by candidates  
and companies
===================================

![Image 16](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675ab9e5d9769f36218d0c24_Converting%20ads%20into%20other%20languages%20(1).jpg)This was my first AI interview and I called my friends immediately later to tell them how well it went.

Amit, Data Scientist 2 Candidate
================================

![Image 17](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/67c88969fa0a334e77b761b4_kunal%20agarwal.jpeg)Fabric helped us close 3 Data Engineer roles in a week. This is the fastest we have ever hired anyone.

Kunal Agarwal, Recruiter
========================

![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/675ab9e58979d1398ab81062_Converting%20ads%20into%20other%20languages.jpg)Now I don't have to worry if the profiles are good or not. Our number of interviews has also decreased.

Sowmya, Hiring Manager
======================

Fabric seamlessly integrates with your hiring process
-----------------------------------------------------

[Book a demo](https://calendar.app.google/ULh34MmMRqcY9f25A)

![Image 19](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/67599eadc6851d70d6bed757_Fabric%20HR%20Website%20Icons-05.png)

### Step 1

Fabric connects with job boards so candidates can directly apply through it

![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/67599eaecf6a2c3d6ba8e1a4_Fabric%20HR%20Website%20Icons-07.png)

### Step 2

Candidates are immediately shortlisted and get  
a link for an AI interview

![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/67599ead2c61e78ae0fdc737_Fabric%20HR%20Website%20Icons-08.png)

### Step 3

Candidates complete their interview whenever they have time (AM/PM)

![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/67599ead4b47d3269148d989_Fabric%20HR%20Website%20Icons-06.png)

### Step 4

Recruiters and hiring managers get a detailed report of shortlisted candidates

FAQs
----

Have a question? You'll probably find the answer here.

What is Fabric?

![Image 23: Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/650031353b3cb15970960bfe_Plus.png)

Fabric is an AI powered recruiting platform, which specializes in human like AI interviews for screening.

Which languages do you support?

![Image 24: Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/650031353b3cb15970960bfe_Plus.png)

We currently support interviews in English, Hindi, and Tamil.

How much time will it take to start with Fabric?

![Image 25: Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/650031353b3cb15970960bfe_Plus.png)

5 minutes. You share the JD with us, answer a few questions, and that's it. We will take care of the rest and promise 20+ relevant profiles in less than 48 hours.

Do the candidates know that they are interviewed by AI?

![Image 26: Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/650031353b3cb15970960bfe_Plus.png)

Of course. Fabric is very transparent with candidates about the interview. We have interviewed over 1000+ candidates, and more than 95% of them prefer our interview to usual HR screening.

I have more questions. Can we have a call?

![Image 27: Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/650031353b3cb15970960bfe_Plus.png)

Of course. You can book a call/demo [here.](https://calendar.app.google/ULh34MmMRqcY9f25A)

Can I also use Fabric for non tech hirings?

![Image 28: Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650031343b3cb15970960aee/650031353b3cb15970960bfe_Plus.png)

We currently support only tech hirings, but we would love to know more about your usecase. You can talk to us [via mail](mailto:abhishek.vijayvergiya@fabrichq.ai?subject=I%20have%20a%20question%20about%20Fabric.) or [book a call](https://calendar.app.google/ULh34MmMRqcY9f25A).

Spend less time screening, more time hiring
===========================================

Fast track your hiring today with Fabric

[Book a demo](https://calendar.app.google/ULh34MmMRqcY9f25A)
